tests.name: "encode all the letters"
tests.cmd: bash atbash_cipher.sh encode "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog."

tests.name: "decode a sentence"
tests.cmd: bash atbash_cipher.sh decode "zmlyh gzxov rhlug vmzhg vkkrm thglm v"

tests.name: "decode numbers"
tests.cmd: bash atbash_cipher.sh decode "gvhgr mt123 gvhgr mt"

tests.name: "decode all the letters"
tests.cmd: bash atbash_cipher.sh decode "gsvjf rxpyi ldmul cqfnk hlevi gsvoz abwlt"

tests.name: "decode with too many spaces"
tests.cmd: bash atbash_cipher.sh decode "vc vix r hn"
